tool_description: Retrieves comprehensive WHOIS information for domains including registration details, contact information, and name servers.

domain_name.description: Domain name to lookup WHOIS information

include_history.description: Whether to include historical WHOIS data

error_messages: Invalid domain name: Provide a valid domain name for WHOIS lookup.
WHOIS service unavailable: Unable to connect to WHOIS database servers.
Domain not found: No WHOIS information available for the specified domain.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many WHOIS queries made in short timeframe.
usage: Provide domain_name to retrieve WHOIS information. Enable include_history to get historical registration data where available.

privacy_protected.description: Whether contact information is privacy protected
